meanings.definition: Having or showing keen interest or enthusiasm
meanings.sent1: The eagers students eagerly raised their hands in class.
meanings.sent2: She is always eagers to learn new things.
meanings.sent3: The eagers puppy wagged its tail excitedly.

meanings.definition: To be eager or keen to do something
meanings.sent1: He eagers to start his new project as soon as possible.
